ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Educational tool for demonstrating and testing WPS vulnerabilities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Offline WPS PIN brute-forcing â€¢ Exploits low entropy in WPS implementations (Pixie-Dust attack) â€¢ Fast PIN recovery (seconds or minutes if vulnerable) â€¢ WPA-PSK recovery from passive captures (limited device support) â€¢ Multi-threading support
ðŸ“– Summary: Pixiewps is a C-based utility designed for offline brute-forcing WPS PINs, exploiting vulnerabilities like the Pixie-Dust attack. It aims to quickly recover WPS PINs and, in some cases, WPA-PSK keys from vulnerable devices, serving as an educational tool for understanding Wi-Fi security weaknesses.
